desc: Fitness Repair Plus is a full-service fitness equipment service provider. With over 25 years of experience, we serve the Philadelphia, Allentown, Harrisburg, and Wilmington metropolitan areas. We work on all the major brands in the fitness industry. Life fitness, Hoist, Spirit, Cybex, Bowflex, and MORE!

layout.text: We Get You Back Up and Running
Fitness Repair Plus is a locally owned and operated full-service fitness repair and preventative maintenance provider
